report.description: This report gives a summary of all gifts which have been entered through your gift receipting system, both for your own field and for other fields. The report shows the gifts for workers and the gifts for Fields, analysed by month, by amount and quantity, with totals. You can produce this report for up to the last 12 years.

queryDetail.value: SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS MonthWorker, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountWorker
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_intl_n) AS MonthWorker, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountWorker

FROM PUB_a_gift as gift, PUB_a_gift_detail as detail, PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_motivation_detail WHERE detail.a_ledger_number_i = gift.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_status_c = "Posted" AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_gl_effective_date_d >= #{{Year0}}-01-01#
AND gift.a_ledger_number_i ={{param_ledger_number_i}} AND detail.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND detail.a_gift_transaction_number_i = gift.a_gift_transaction_number_i
AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = detail.a_motivation_group_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_receipt_l = true

AND ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SUPPORT" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "USA SUPP" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SHRTTERM" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "UNKFLD" )
AND detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = "GIFT" AND ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SUPPORT" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "PERSONAL" )
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-0{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-0{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-0{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d <= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-31#
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS MonthField, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountField
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_intl_n) AS MonthField, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountField

FROM PUB_a_gift as gift, PUB_a_gift_detail as detail, PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_motivation_detail WHERE detail.a_ledger_number_i = gift.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_status_c = "Posted" AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_gl_effective_date_d >= #{{Year0}}-01-01#
AND gift.a_ledger_number_i ={{param_ledger_number_i}} AND detail.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND detail.a_gift_transaction_number_i = gift.a_gift_transaction_number_i
AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = detail.a_motivation_group_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_receipt_l = true

AND detail.a_motivation_group_code_c != "NON GIFT" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "PERSONAL" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "USA SUPP" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "SHRTTERM" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "UNKFLD" )
AND ( detail.a_motivation_group_code_c != "GIFT" OR ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "SUPPORT" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "PERSONAL" ) )
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-0{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-0{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-0{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d < #{{Year0}}-{{Month1}}-01#
AND gift.a_date_entered_d >= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-01# AND gift.a_date_entered_d <= #{{Year0}}-{{Month0}}-31#
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS YearWorker, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountYearWorker
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_intl_n) AS YearWorker, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountYearWorker

FROM PUB_a_gift as gift, PUB_a_gift_detail as detail, PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_motivation_detail WHERE detail.a_ledger_number_i = gift.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_status_c = "Posted" AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_gl_effective_date_d >= #{{param_Year0}}-01-01#
AND gift.a_ledger_number_i ={{param_ledger_number_i}} AND detail.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND detail.a_gift_transaction_number_i = gift.a_gift_transaction_number_i
AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = detail.a_motivation_group_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_receipt_l = true AND gift.a_date_entered_d BETWEEN #{{param_Year0}}-01-01# AND #{{param_Year0}}-12-31#

AND ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SUPPORT" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "USA SUPP" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SHRTTERM" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "UNKFLD" )
AND detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = "GIFT" AND ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "SUPPORT" OR detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = "PERSONAL" )
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS YearField, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountYearField
SELECT SUM (detail.a_gift_amount_intl_n) AS YearField, COUNT (detail.a_gift_amount_n) AS CountYearField

FROM PUB_a_gift as gift, PUB_a_gift_detail as detail, PUB_a_gift_batch, PUB_a_motivation_detail WHERE detail.a_ledger_number_i = gift.a_ledger_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_status_c = "Posted" AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_gift_batch.a_gl_effective_date_d >= #{{param_Year0}}-01-01#
AND gift.a_ledger_number_i ={{param_ledger_number_i}} AND detail.a_batch_number_i = gift.a_batch_number_i AND detail.a_gift_transaction_number_i = gift.a_gift_transaction_number_i
AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_ledger_number_i = {{param_ledger_number_i}} AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_group_code_c = detail.a_motivation_group_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c = detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c AND PUB_a_motivation_detail.a_receipt_l = true AND gift.a_date_entered_d BETWEEN #{{param_Year0}}-01-01# AND #{{param_Year0}}-12-31#

AND detail.a_motivation_group_code_c != "NON GIFT" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "PERSONAL" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "USA SUPP" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "SHRTTERM" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "UNKFLD" )
AND ( detail.a_motivation_group_code_c != "GIFT" OR ( detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "SUPPORT" AND detail.a_motivation_detail_code_c != "PERSONAL" ) )
